name: project_dbgap_accession_number
description: eg phs000471 or CCLE or blank, for TCGA, the dbgap accession is at the program level not at the project level

name: project_disease_type
description: eg 'Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia' or 'Breast Invasive Carcinoma' etc

name: project_name
description: eg 'Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia - Phase II' or 'Breast Invasive Carcinoma' etc

name: case_barcode
description: submitter identifier, eg HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc

name: legacy_file_count
description: total number of files for this case in the GDC legacy archive

name: active_file_count
description: total number of files for this case in the active (default) GDC archive
